product_name: The North Face Chimborazo Hoodie Jacket - Boys'
long_description: Boys who wear The North Face Chimborazo Hoodie jacket for outdoor adventures in cold weather will love its windproof, soft-shell protection and cozy sherpa-lined fleece interior. Polyester soft-shell fabric repels snow, rain and wind and dissipates body heat with ample breathability. A zippered chest pocket features a media compartment designed to protect his MP3 player. Brushed sherpa fleece lining cozies up against the skin with sumptuously soft and warm comfort. Hood with elastic binding adds warmth and protection from the elements. The North Face Chimborazo Hoodie jacket for boys features zippered hand pockets and stretch insets at the cuffs.
short_description: Boys who wear The North Face Chimborazo Hoodie jacket for outdoor adventures in cold weather will love its windproof, soft-shell protection and cozy sherpa-lined fleece interior.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
